fields.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.blurb: A creamy and indulgent pasta dish with pancetta.
fields.ingredients: Spaghetti, pancetta, eggs, Parmesan cheese, black pepper
fields.method: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all.

fields.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
fields.blurb: A healthy bowl packed with plant-based goodness.
fields.ingredients: Quinoa, chickpeas, sweet potato, kale, tahini dressing
fields.method: Roast sweet potato. Cook quinoa. Assemble with kale and dressing.

fields.title: Gluten-Free Pancakes
fields.blurb: Fluffy and delicious pancakes without the gluten.
fields.ingredients: Gluten-free flour, eggs, almond milk, baking powder, maple syrup
fields.method: Mix ingredients. Cook on a hot skillet. Serve with syrup.

fields.title: Lactose-Free Cheesecake
fields.blurb: A creamy cheesecake everyone can enjoy.
fields.ingredients: Lactose-free cream cheese, sugar, gluten-free biscuits, coconut oil
fields.method: Prepare crust. Mix filling. Chill in the fridge.

fields.title: Nut-Free Granola Bars
fields.blurb: Perfect snack without the worry of nuts.
fields.ingredients: Oats, honey, sunflower seeds, chocolate chips
fields.method: Mix ingredients. Press into pan. Bake until golden.
